titleStmt.title: A banquet of essayes, fetcht out of famous Owens confectionary, disht out, and served up at the table of Mecoenas by Henry Harflete ...
Epigrammata Horace. English. Selections. 1653
titleStmt.author: Harflete, Henry, fl. 1653.

Horace.

publicationStmt.publisher: And are to be sold by Joseph Barker ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
"Consists of seven essays on one of Owen's epigrams, in which occur frequent translations in verse from Horace, Owen, &c." Dict. Nat. Biog.
